result.eng: I am from Poland originally but I live in Ireland now.
result.ga: Is as an Pholainn ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí in Éirinn anois
result.orig: Is as an Pholainn ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí in Éirinn anois
result.html: Is as an Pholainn ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí in Éirinn anoisI am from Poland originally but I live in Ireland now.
result.ponchtml: Is as an Ṗolainn ó ḋúċas mé aċ tá mé i mo ċónaí in Éirinn anoisI am from Poland originally but I live in Ireland now.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: Benoît Mandelbrot was born in Poland in 1924.
result.ga: Rugadh Benoît Mandelbrot sa Pholainn i 1924
result.orig: Rugadh Benoît Mandelbrot sa Pholainn i 1924
result.html: Rugadh Benoît Mandelbrot sa Pholainn i 1924Benoît Mandelbrot was born in Poland in 1924.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ Benoît Mandelbrot sa Ṗolainn i 1924Benoît Mandelbrot was born in Poland in 1924.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.orig: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.html: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
